Groups.Name: Main
Groups.DisplayName: Like a Werehog: Extreme Fury [Definitive Edition]

Elements.Name: IncludeDir1
Description: Select whether to use the base game LAW content.
If unsure, the default options shipped with the mod is the best setup!

Elements.Name: IncludeDir2
Description: Select whether to use the Gaiden content.
This is the DLC content for Like a Werehog.
If unsure, the default options shipped with the mod is the best setup!

Elements.Name: IncludeDir3
Description: Select whether to use Like a Werehog: Extreme Fury.
This auto supports the DLC for the styles but will require Gaiden for the Werehog style.
If unsure, the default options shipped with the mod is the best setup!

Elements.Name: IncludeDir4
Description: Select which difficulty to play with for the LAW Extreme Fury styles.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir25
Description: Select which difficulty to play with for the HMC Dark Slayer style.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir5
Description: Select which fur quality to use.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir16
Description: Select whether to use the unique style models from CWD for these styles.
- Legend.
- Reborn.
- Berserker.
You may wish to disable this if you are using model swaps for the Werehog and wish for these styles to change to.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir6
Description: Select whether to use the battle theme inlcuded in the mod.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir7
Description: Select whether to use the jingles inlcuded in the mod.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir17
Description: Allows you to unlock some extra LAW media such as images, audio & enemy logs in the Lab.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir8
Description: Challenge!
Select whether to use One Hit KO.
This will make it so that any damage will instantly kill you!

Elements.Name: IncludeDir9
Description: Challenge!
Select whether to use Ring Allergy.
This will make rings harm you!

Elements.Name: IncludeDir18
Description: Select which HUD option to use in the mod.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir19
Description: Select which text to use in the mod.
Original: OG Like a Werehog EdoSZ style text.
Faithful: Base game style text but accommodated for Like a Werehog.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir10
Description: Select which style icons to use in the mod.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir24
Description: Select which booting logo you wish to use with the mod.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir11
Description: Select whether to enable the HMC Collab stage.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir21
Description: Select whether to boot directly into the HUB World of the mod.
When enabled this will only function when you have completed the game, until then the game will function as usual.
You can still access the World Map from the HUB World via an Entrance Gate.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir22
Description: Select whether to have the additional time scene in the HUB World, this time scene is set at roughly 1800 in game thus can appear to be daytime.
Users may wish to disable this if they prefer lore consistency.
If you are currently in this time scene and you disable it you may still be in it when you load in to the HUB, just changing the time via the time switch will solve this.
